Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

:::Starscream/Sharpedge:::

::The realization dawned on him.  Diamond hadnt been seen since Kitkat's 
death::
Starscream: Oh my god...
::He than sees Drillbit going the other way.  He follows him to where 
Darkmouse is and sees Drillbit's box.  he starts feeling terrible about 
having a crush on Kitkat, when she and Drillbit were more in love than any 2 
people he had ever seen in his life::
Starscream: Wow.  She REALLY loved you.
::he than heres Drillbits announcement::
Starscream: Well, if your the leader, im staying.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------

---------------------------------------------
::Sharpedge grinned from ear to ear as he heard this::
Sharpedge: I understand you perfectly.  But why is Doom Ice one of your 
targets?

--part1_a4.cb8332e.27583625_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
